short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your trusty assistant in Google Chrome, making data chat-worthy and enhancing your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to TabgpT, your ultimate Chrome assistant! You can now interact with any webpage by asking questions or extracting information.


Utilizing TabgpT: A Step-by-Step Guide

1. Activate the TabgpT extension on the webpage from which you wish to extract information.
2. Click the 'Turn On' button located at the top right corner.
3. TabgpT will then analyze the webpage and suggest a list of sample questions for your consideration.
4. Formulate a question according to your specific needs.
5. TabgpT will provide an answer to your question, drawing from the content of the webpage.
